devdoc.author: Venus Protocol
devdoc.details: This contract allows users to:      - Supply funds to Venus markets using different assets (swap-and-supply)      - Repay debts using different assets (swap-and-repay)      Compatible with immutable vBNB market.

MarketNotListed(address).custom:error: Thrown when market is not listed in comptroller

NativeTransferFailed().custom:error: Thrown when native token transfer fails

NoTokensReceived().custom:error: Thrown when no tokens are received from swap

UnauthorizedNativeSender(address).custom:error: Thrown when unauthorized sender tries to send native tokens

ZeroAddress().custom:error: Thrown when a zero address is provided

ZeroAmount().custom:error: Thrown when zero amount is provided

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._comptroller: The address of the Venus Comptroller contract
params._nativeVToken: The address of the native vToken (e.g., vBNB)
params._swapHelper: The address of the SwapHelper contract
params._wrappedNative: The address of the wrapped native token (e.g., WBNB)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amountIn: The amount of input tokens to swap
params.minAmountOut: The minimum amount of output tokens expected
params.swapCallData: Array of bytes containing swap instructions
params.tokenIn: The input token to swap from
params.vToken: The vToken market to repay debt to

params.maxAmountIn: The maximum amount of input tokens to use
params.swapCallData: Array of bytes containing swap instructions
params.tokenIn: The input token to swap from
params.vToken: The vToken market to repay full debt to

params.amountIn: The amount of input tokens to swap
params.minAmountOut: The minimum amount of output tokens expected
params.swapCallData: Array of bytes containing swap instructions
params.tokenIn: The input token to swap from
params.vToken: The vToken market to supply to

params.minAmountOut: The minimum amount of output tokens expected
params.swapCallData: Array of bytes containing swap instructions
params.vToken: The vToken market to repay debt to

params.minAmountOut: The minimum amount of output tokens expected
params.swapCallData: Array of bytes containing swap instructions
params.vToken: The vToken market to supply to

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: SwapRouter

SwapAndRepay(address,address,address,add.notice: Emitted when tokens are swapped and used to repay debt

SwapAndSupply(address,address,address,ad.notice: Emitted when tokens are swapped and supplied to a Venus market

SweepNative(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when leftover native tokens are swept by owner

SweepToken(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when leftover ERC-20 tokens are swept by owner

COMPTROLLER().notice: The Venus comptroller contract for market validation and operations

SWAP_HELPER().notice: The swap helper contract for executing token swaps

WRAPPED_NATIVE().notice: The wrapped native token contract (e.g., WBNB)

initialize().notice: Initializes the contract, setting up the upgradeable components

swapAndRepay(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Swaps tokens and repays debt to a Venus market

swapAndRepayFull(address,address,uint256.notice: Swaps tokens and repays the full debt for a user

swapAndSupply(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Swaps tokens and supplies the result to a Venus market

swapNativeAndRepay(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Swaps native tokens and repays debt to a Venus market

swapNativeAndSupply(address,uint256,byte.notice: Swaps native tokens (BNB) and supplies to a Venus market

sweepNative().notice: Sweeps leftover native tokens from the contract

sweepToken(address).notice: Sweeps leftover ERC-20 tokens from the contract

userdoc.notice: A contract for swap features: swap-and-supply and swap-and-repay operations
